name: Fire and Fondness
description:
The year is 4189. In the far-flung world of Todog, a slight misunderstanding of the traditions of early human civilisation has led to a peculiar new custom: that of attempting to woo one's darling while locked in a burning building.

Fire and Fondness was made in 36 hours for the Godot Community Game Jam in June 2018. You can play the enhanced, post-jam version here.
